set.name: DMSD-18 King Master Start Deck: Jendle's Dispector

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Angel Command/Demon Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature by the effect of a non-multicolored spell, this creature can't be chosen. ■ When you put this creature or when this creature's "EX Life" shield leaves your shield zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. At the start of your opponent's next turn, that creature doesn't untap. {SASAGALE} 1 (While summoning a Dispector, you may reduce its cost by 1. If you do, destroy this creature. That Dispector can't cost less than 0.)
